channel.title: Posts on Que Le
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Que Le

item.title: Machine Learning
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Database Systems
item.description: Introduction to designing and implementing modern database systems in large-scale enterprise applications, covering the conceptual representation of data, conversion to specific models like the relational data model, utilization of SQL for defining relations and executing data operations, exploration of relation forms with favorable properties, and a conclusion with advanced topics in database management.

item.title: Computer Organization and Programming
item.description: An introduction to basic computer hardware, machine language, assembly language, and C programming.

item.title: Info Security
item.description: Mathematical notation in a Hugo project can be enabled by using third party JavaScript libraries.

item.description: Mathematical notation in a Hugo project can be enabled by using third party JavaScript libraries.
